Articles.Content:
Hello

I am new to Ksp and can't use my keyboard ingame Ingame except shift and Alt+F4 but my Mouse still works fine.

I have no Add-ons installed and reinstalled Ksp multiple times. I also tryed Restarting my Computer and Pressein Alt+F12 but that diden't fix annything.

Yesterday it worked fine but now it dosen't , to the point that i can't even open the Menu. But sometimes it works for a split second but then it stops again.

I have no Idea why this dosen't work .

The bug is in every Mode and in the Main Menu but I can type in Inputboxes (like the naming of my craft) .

I use a German copy of the game and the "qwertz" layout is recognized .

 

Pls help me I have no idea what I need to do ...

 

 

Edited August 7, 2018 by RedstoneMedia
Errors
Haha can use Krpc to control my ship so i could make my own Key listener and control my missel like that !

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

1 hour ago, RedstoneMedia said:

I am new to Ksp and can't use my keyboard ingame Ingame except shift and Alt+F4 but my Mouse still works fine.

...Just to verify... are you running KerbalEDU?  Or are you running the Kerbal Space Program game?

The two are different things.  You've posted here in the KerbalEDU forum, but since your post doesn't actually mention KerbalEDU, was wondering if perhaps you're just running KSP and accidentally posted in the wrong place?
Oh yeah its worng i talk about the Kerb﻿al Space Program﻿ ga﻿me . Where do I have to post to get this right ? Or can I move this issue ?
